page.title: 11Social Concerns - Taverham
page.content: The{day care centre}is for old and handicapped people and meets on Mondays and Wednesdays.They have lunch together and then play cards,bingo etc It was begun 5 yrs ago by the Social Services and was expanded in January 1985 to 2 days per wk. Drivers agree to fetch the people in a mini bus. {WAVE}is the name of the group campaigning to raise enough money to build a 25 metre{swimming pool}between Fakenham Rd. and Fir Covert Rd. in the new planned development. They began in 1982 and have so far raised Â£5000. Mrs. Matthews started a{playgroup 5 yrs ago for children <5.She takes 16 (8 at a time) between 9.00 and 12.00 each day. She provides paint, toys and puzzles,teaches alphabet and number <6 takes the children for walks in the park or to Norwich by bus. She has 1 regular helper & occasional volunteers
